title: Appmap
description: "Appmap" serves as a utility that empowers the visualization and analysis of critical user action flows within a web application. This tool facilitates the detailed examination of transitions between web pages and user actions within a singular page. The representation of web page transitions takes the form of a directed graph, wherein nodes depict distinct web pages accompanied by screenshots, and edges symbolize user actions. This graphical representation provides a comprehensive overview, enabling a thorough analysis of the intricate interactions and user journeys within the web application.
